testcase.name: LoginToMFTInCloud
testcase.remarks: Asset (LoginToMFTInCloud) not executed as it has been disabled by user in SAT

teststep.name: loginToMFTCloud
teststep.description: This action will login to active transfer cloud

step.description: Verify "Welcome to webMethods.io MFT" Label above "A centrally managed tool to perform secure and reliable file transfers with your partners." Label isVisible
Verify Expand Label following Users label isVisible [timeout=3]
Click Expand Label following Users label

Click Users link above Groups link
Verify Failed Label isVisible ERROR MSG: Element is not present/visible on the page even after waiting for 10000 milliseconds
*** END ifsatisfy "Verify "Failed" Label isVisible" execute "Click "Close" Button"
Click Add Button following Users label
Type bvt_ftpsuser in textfield below "User ID" label
Type BVT in textfield below "First name" label
Type ftpsuser in textfield below "Last name" label
Type cat@soft.com in textfield below "Email address" label
Type Welcome@1 in textfield below Password label
Type Welcome@1 in textfield below "Confirm Password" label
Verify bvt_ftpsuser label below "User list" label isVisible
Click Create Button following Cancel button
Verify Expand Label preceding Filters label isVisible [timeout=3]
Click Expand Label preceding Filters label
*** END ifsatisfy "Verify "Expand" Label preceding "Filters" label isVisible [timeout=3]" execute "Click "Expand" Label preceding "Filters" label"
Verify bvt_ftpsuser label below "User name" label isVisible

Click Apply Button following Reset Button
Click default link below Folders label
Verify "User name" Label preceding View label isNotVisible
*** END ifsatisfy "Verify "User name" Label preceding "View" label isNotVisible" execute "Click "Permissions" label"

Type bvt_ftpsuser in textfield preceding Search Button
